issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

ipod 4gt (4.2) mobile sdk build 1.5.0.fb4b340

1.Phone > Orientation
2.hold phone in portrait
3.tap "allow landscape only"
4.screen rotates to landscape, hold in portrait still
5.tap controls tab

results: app is portrait, tabs are landscape (see screen shot)

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: steps to have the Tab UI apppear in landscape while phone is portrait

comments.body:
Tested on an iPhone 3GS using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce, the tab group is correctly in-sync with the orientation mode. 

Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
